about_the_game:
WyrmBound is a single-player action-adventure RPG with Souls-like elements set in a fantasy Asian themed world. Take on the role of a skillful samurai warrior, forge alliances with mighty dragons and engage in epic battles against legendary Asian deities and mythical creatures to restore peace to the land.

WyrmBound plays like a combination of Sekiro and Scalebound.

DRAGON ALLY

In the world of WyrmBound, players will discover a diverse array of dragons, each with its unique characteristics and abilities. These dragons vary in size, elemental powers, and combat styles, allowing players to tailor their dragon companion to their preferred playstyle. Whether you seek the fiery might of a dragon that breathes scorching flames or the elemental mastery of one who commands the forces of ice or lightning, WyrmBound offers a selection of these majestic creatures to befriend and fight alongside.

COMBAT SYSTEM

The combat system in WyrmBound draws heavy inspiration from Souls-like games, offering a challenging experience with a more accessible level of difficulty.
Players can hone their weapon skills, unlock powerful combos and special moves that enhance their combat abilities. Whether you're a seasoned Souls-like player or new to the genre, Dragon Nexus offers an engaging combat system that rewards both dedication and skill.

VAST FANTASY WORLD

In WyrmBound, the vast fantasy world is not just a setting; it's a living, breathing entity that invites players to become fully immersed in its beauty, mystery, and adventure. Each locale is meticulously crafted with intricate details, providing a sense of realism and immersion that draws players deeper into the adventure.

Wishlist now and secure your limited edition dragon on launch!
